FieldDefinition.description: Complete test case name, including all parent test suites
FieldDefinition.name: id

FieldDefinition.description: Direct test suite name, i.e. thing name
FieldDefinition.name: testSuite

FieldDefinition.description: Test case name, i.e. service name
FieldDefinition.name: testCase

FieldDefinition.description: Execution status, one of the following: Scheduled, Executing, Success, Failure, Aborted, Timeout
FieldDefinition.name: state

FieldDefinition.description: The user which was used for executing this test case
FieldDefinition.name: runAs

FieldDefinition.description: When the execution ended or aborted
FieldDefinition.name: end
